experience.title: Product Consultant
experience.description: Enhanced app rating from 2.4 to 3.8 and decreased user issues by 21% through prioritized pain point resolution strategies.Reduced overall user resolution time by 2 hours via streamlined support processes leveraging Salesforce optimization.Innovated a new class and test scheduling system, minimizing manual efforts and errors for operational teams.

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest
positions.description: • Responsible for leading the apex body consisting of 22 Core Organising Team members, 40 Associates.• Spearheading more than 100 fest time events, along with the nationwide prelims of 10 events across 20 cities in India • Solely responsible for formulation, planning & execution of Dance, Food-Fest genres of the fest • Handling the creative online events of the fest through various existing social media platforms catering to 200,000+ followers.•Collaborated with leading media houses and managed to get Spring Fest featured in 200 media articles and 20 online media Partners.•Coordinated a 30member, three-tier design, and media team, responsible for the design and content development to promote the fest.•Spearheaded Spring Fest Social Initiative Virasat to promote different cultures of India.
positions.title: Events Head , Media and Public Relations Head and Design Coordinator
positions.description_html:
• Responsible for leading the apex body consisting of 22 Core Organising Team members, 40 Associates.
• Spearheading more than 100 fest time events, along with the nationwide prelims of 10 events across 20 cities in India
• Solely responsible for formulation, planning & execution of Dance, Food-Fest genres of the fest
• Handling the creative online events of the fest through various existing social media platforms catering to 200,000+ followers.
•Collaborated with leading media houses and managed to get Spring Fest featured in 200 media articles and 20 online media Partners.
•Coordinated a 30member, three-tier design, and media team, responsible for the design and content development to promote the fest.
•Spearheaded Spring Fest Social Initiative Virasat to promote different cultures of India.

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest
positions.description: Core Organising Team MemberDates EmployedAug 2019 – Aug 2020Employment Duration12 mosLocationKharagpur Area, India• Individually garnered funds amounting to INR 3.74 lakhs through corporate deals and alumni contribution• Single-handedly organized a complete Nukkad, KTM Stunt Show, Salsa.• Co-led a team of 35 Associate Members, responsible for effective publicity in over 700+ colleges across the country, and publication of articles in different regional and national newspapers and magazines in India• Achieved a 78% YoY increase in participation from Maharashtra by publicizing the fest extensively in over 100+ colleges• Conducted single-handed the nationwide prelims First time ever of 5 events in Nagpur achieving 300+ participation.• Conducted the Eliminations First time ever in Raipur,  which includes Poetry slam and Hilarity ensues achieving 100+ participants• Coordinated International Carnival, inviting artists from Iceland, Israel, Denmark, Singapore, Sweden, Canada, and Poland
positions.title: Core organising team member of spring fest
positions.description_html:
Core Organising Team Member
Dates EmployedAug 2019 – Aug 2020
Employment Duration12 mos
LocationKharagpur Area, India
• Individually garnered funds amounting to INR 3.74 lakhs through corporate deals and alumni contribution
• Single-handedly organized a complete Nukkad, KTM Stunt Show, Salsa.
• Co-led a team of 35 Associate Members, responsible for effective publicity in over 700+ colleges across the country, and publication of articles in different regional and national newspapers and magazines in India
• Achieved a 78% YoY increase in participation from Maharashtra by publicizing the fest extensively in over 100+ colleges
• Conducted single-handed the nationwide prelims First time ever of 5 events in Nagpur achieving 300+ participation.
• Conducted the Eliminations First time ever in Raipur, which includes Poetry slam and Hilarity ensues achieving 100+ participants
• Coordinated International Carnival, inviting artists from Iceland, Israel, Denmark, Singapore, Sweden, Canada, and Poland
